original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū uppathena gacchantā pathena gacchantassa dhammaṁ desenti …pe….
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū uppathena gacchantā pathena gacchantassa dhammaṃ desenti pe

original: “Na uppathena gacchanto pathena gacchantassa agilānassa dhammaṁ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
analyzed: na uppathena gacchantaḥ pathena gacchantassa agilānassa dhammam desessāmi iti sikkhā karaṇīyā ati

original: Na uppathena gacchantena pathena gacchantassa agilānassa dhammo desetabbo.
analyzed: na uppathena gacchantena pathena gacchantassa agilānassa dhammaḥ desetabbo

original: Yo anādariyaṁ paṭicca uppathena gacchanto pathena gacchantassa agilānassa dhammaṁ deseti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: yaḥ anādariyam paṭicca uppathena gacchantaḥ pathena gacchantassa agilānassa dhammam deseti āpatti dukkaṭassa
